```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
library(CodeClanData)
```

```{r}
drinks_content
```

```{r}
dim(drinks_content)
```

```{r}
glimpse(drinks_content)
```

```{r}
drinks_content %>%
  drop_na(Calories) %>% 
  select(Beverage_category, Beverage, Beverage_prep, Calories)
```

```{r}
drinks_content %>%
  drop_na(Calories) %>% 
  select(Beverage_category, Beverage, Beverage_prep, Calories) %>% 
  mutate(calorie_diff = Calories - 135)
```

```{r}
drinks_content %>%
  drop_na(Calories) %>% 
  select(Beverage_category, Beverage, Beverage_prep, Calories) %>% 
  mutate(calorie_diff = Calories - 135) %>% 
  group_by(Beverage_category) %>% 
  summarise(avg_cals = mean(Calories)) %>% 
  arrange(avg_cals)
```

```{r}
drinks_content %>%
  drop_na(Calories) %>% 
  select(Beverage_category, Beverage, Beverage_prep, Calories) %>% 
  mutate(calorie_diff = Calories - 135) %>% 
  group_by(Beverage_prep) %>% 
  summarise(avg_cals = mean(Calories)) %>% 
  arrange(avg_cals)
```

```{r}
drinks_content %>% 
  drop_na(Calories) %>% 
  summarise(mean(Calories))
```

```{r}
drinks_content %>% 
  drop_na(Calories) %>%
  group_by(Beverage_prep) %>% 
  filter(Calories > 193.8719) %>% 
  summarise(count = n())
```

```{r}
drinks_content %>%
  drop_na(Calories) %>% 
  select(Beverage_category, Beverage, Beverage_prep, Calories) %>% 
  mutate(calorie_diff = Calories - 135) %>% 
  group_by(Beverage_category) %>% 
  mutate(avg_cals_cat = mean(Calories)) %>% 
  group_by(Beverage_prep) %>% 
  mutate(avg_cals_prep = mean(Calories)) %>%
  group_by(Beverage) %>% 
  mutate(avg_cals_bev = mean(Calories)) %>% 
  arrange(avg_cals_bev, avg_cals_cat, avg_cals_prep)
```
